## Safety Checklist

- [ ] SQL syntax has been validated
- [ ] Script has been tested in a development environment
- [ ] Rollback plan is documented (if applicable)
- [ ] Appropriate target database is selected
- [ ] Script includes metadata comments (Author, Purpose, Target, Date)
- [ ] No sensitive data is exposed in the script
- [ ] Script is idempotent (can be run multiple times safely) OR is one-time only
